root: ^Kalil;I know that, you know it, the entire group knows it.
^Kalil;We don't need to go over that again.
^Kalil;I could bring up a bunch of stuff that's going on in my life or the feelings I've been dealing with to try to justify it, but I won't.

c-1: ^Player;I'm not sure it's that easy Kalil...
^Player;You said a lot of messed up stuff yesterday. To all of us.
^Kalil;I just said we don't need to go over what happened yesterday.
^Player;well other people might not feel the same way
^Kalil;I guess you have a point there
g-0: ^Kalil;oh hey while I've got your attention:
^Kalil;I wanted to ask Tanya to the party, but after...
^Kalil;Do you think I have a shot with Tanya? Orrrrrr...
^Kalil;You're the one who's known her longest

c-0: ^Kalil;Thanks for the vote of confidence m8
^Player;What makes you think she'd even be interested?
^Kalil;What about what's his name in year 6...Patrick Millwing?
^Player;Nope, they just hung out because their moms were a part of the same diocese
^Kalil;If she HASNT dated anyone so far, then I could have a better chance than just about anyone.
^Kalil;...maybe she's even been waiting for me.
c-1: ^Player;It's hard to get a read on her for stuff like that.
^Player;Come to think of it, I've never seen Tanya *date anyone* per se
^Player;You met her shortly after I did. Youd know.
^Kalil;It MUST have happened at some point, right?
^Kalil;What about what's his name in year 6...Patrick Millwing?
^Player;Nope, they just hung out because their moms were a part of the same diocese
^Kalil;If she HASNT dated anyone so far, then I could have a better chance than just about anyone.
^Kalil;...maybe she's even been waiting for me.
g-0: ^Player;...Why are you putting yourself through this?
^Player;Things are already awkward in the group
^Player;Why pursue this--or if you're going to do it, why now?
^Kalil;Do you know how long I've fancied Tanya?
^Kalil;from the day you introduced us in 4th year
^Kalil;Do you know what its like to be hungry?

c-0: ^Player;When I was younger, mum and dad stayed away overnight for a date.
^Player;They left me at home with a sitter.
^Player;At first everything was okay, but then the sitter started muttering about 'being reduced' to looking over 'barbarian children' and took her stuff and walked out the door
^Player;I didn't know how to cook, and all the cabinets and such were locked--the sitter had the key
^Player;when mum and dad came back the next day, I had chewed up every nail I had and was starting on a couch cushion
^Player;I certainly know what it's like to be hungry--and the cabinets aren't locked anymore
^Player;So why did you want to hear about my occasionally disturbing childhood?
^Kalil;i feel like I've been starving my entire life
^Kalil;and when I met Tanya, it was like I saw my first chance to be truly full
c-1: ^Kalil;tell me if you were ever really, truly hungry and maybe you'll find out
^Player;When I was younger, mum and dad stayed away overnight for a date.
^Player;They left me at home with a sitter.
^Player;At first everything was okay, but then the sitter started muttering about 'being reduced' to looking over 'barbarian children' and took her stuff and walked out the door
^Player;I didn't know how to cook, and all the cabinets and such were locked--the sitter had the key
^Player;when mum and dad came back the next day, I had chewed up every nail I had and was starting on a couch cushion
^Player;I certainly know what it's like to be hungry--and the cabinets aren't locked anymore
^Player;So why did you want to hear about my occasionally disturbing childhood?
^Kalil;i feel like I've been starving my entire life
^Kalil;and when I met Tanya, it was like I saw my first chance to be truly full
g-0: ^Player;I just told you a legit story about STARVING as a KID
^Player;and you came back with 'my crush deserves to be returned'

c-1: ^Player;I shouldn't have made light of your feelings.
^Player;Please tell me whats going on. I care.
^Kalil;just to be clear, I'm doing this for you, not for me.
^Kalil;They made it clear that I was going somewhere beneath our station, so i could be in touch with 'the common people'
^Kalil;(now they say i'm too in touch with the common people but that's a different issue)
^Kalil;They want me to be some kind of fucking politician like her
^Kalil;when I came to school, I was supposed to be like everyone else but...not.
^Kalil;there was this HOLE. This gap in my chest where who I am is supposed to be, that never got filled in.
^Kalil;When we met, and I liked you, and you liked me, it felt like that gap shrunk a little bit
^Kalil;When Hema and Anetta and Jessie came along, and they liked me too, it felt like it shrunk even more
^Kalil;i don't know what happens when the hole gets larger than me
^Kalil;that's why this party stuff is so important
^Kalil;When you introduced me to Tanya, I saw pain in her. The same pain that haunted me when I closed my eyes.
^Kalil;I thought, here was a person who could finally fill that gap
^Kalil;And I don't know...I feel like if I don't make my move now, I'll never get another chance

c-0: ^Player;And I get where you're *coming from*, but I'm still not sure making a move on Tanya is a good idea
^Player;Maybe that hole you mentioned...Maybe that's something deeper that needs to be addressed. And I'm here if you want to do that.
^Kalil;I didn't expect you to really understand.
c-1: ^Player;I'm just not sure you 'making a move' on Tanya is a good idea
^Player;Maybe that hole you mentioned...Maybe that's something deeper that needs to be addressed. And I'm here if you want to do that.
^Kalil;I didn't expect you to really understand.
